name: restrictions
rows: I-84 between I-81 and NY Line. The speed limit has been reduced to 45mph with Commercial Vehicles Right Lane Only.
I-380 between I-80 and I-84. The speed limit has been reduced to 45mph with Commercial Vehicles Right Lane Only.
Other incident on I-81 between Exit 100: PA 443 - PINE GROVE and Exit 138: PA 309 - MCADOO/TAMAQUA. The speed limit has been reduced to 55 miles per hour.
